overview: AJ steals her husband's mistress and pleases her like her husband never could. Mason gets back at her boss by fucking her boyfriend at the company office party in his big, designer, closet all over his fancy coats! Mr.Marcus turns the tables on the GPS girl and fucks her from every direction including South. And Madelyn turns the tables on AJ, as they sway boyfriends and revenge fuck all night long!
tagline: Payback is a bitch. Especially when it's our bitches.
title: A.J. Bailey is Tight
